Quotes.q: Your dream has to be bigger than your fear.
Quotes.h:
“Your dream has to be bigger than your fear.” —
Steve Harvey

Quotes.q: Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane.
Quotes.h:
“Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane.” —
Criss Jami

Quotes.q: Always try to be a little kinder than necessary.
Quotes.h:
“Always try to be a little kinder than necessary.” —
James Matthew Barrie

Quotes.q: You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept.
Quotes.h:
“You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept. ” —
Kahlil Gibran

Quotes.q: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
Quotes.h:
“The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering. ” —
Bruce Lee

Quotes.q: To do great work one must be very idle as well as very industrious.
Quotes.h:
“To do great work one must be very idle as well as very industrious.” —
Samuel Butler

Quotes.q: There is no path to Love. Love is the path.
Quotes.h:
“There is no path to Love. Love is the path.” —
Dan Millman

Quotes.q: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Quotes.h:
“The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

Quotes.q: Make each day a new horizon.
Quotes.h:
“Make each day a new horizon.” —
Christopher McCandless

Quotes.q: To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable.
Quotes.h:
“To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

Quotes.q: Leadership is solving problems
Quotes.h:
“Leadership is solving problems” —
Colin Powell

Quotes.q: Love is not about possession. Love is about appreciation.
Quotes.h:
“Love is not about possession. Love is about appreciation.” —
Osho

Quotes.q: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
Quotes.h:
“Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.” —
T.S. Eliot

Quotes.q: Light a candle instead of cursing the darkness.
Quotes.h:
“Light a candle instead of cursing the darkness.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

Quotes.q: Most of us live our lives by accident - we live as it happens. Fulfilment comes when we live our lives on purpose.
Quotes.h:
“Most of us live our lives by accident - we live as it happens. Fulfilment comes when we live our lives on purpose.” —
Simon Sinek

Quotes.q: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and got to work.
Quotes.h:
“Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and got to work.” —
Stephen King

Quotes.q: The more you give, the more comes back to you.
Quotes.h:
“The more you give, the more comes back to you.” —
Napoleon Hill

Quotes.q: True love stories never have endings.
Quotes.h:
“True love stories never have endings.” —
Richard Bach

Quotes.q: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Quotes.h:
“What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.” —
Henry David Thoreau

Quotes.q: Living life in style also means living a life of balance.
Quotes.h:
“Living life in style also means living a life of balance.” —
Jim Rohn

Quotes.q: Most people get ahead during the time that others waste.
Quotes.h:
“Most people get ahead during the time that others waste.” —
Henry Ford

Quotes.q: To achieve, you need thought. You have to know what you are doing and that's real power.
Quotes.h:
“To achieve, you need thought. You have to know what you are doing and that's real power.” —
Ayn Rand

Quotes.q: It doesn't matter how much you want. What really matters is how much you want it.
Quotes.h:
“It doesn't matter how much you want. What really matters is how much you want it.” —
Ralph Marston

Quotes.q: I'd rather welcome change than cling to the past.
Quotes.h:
“I'd rather welcome change than cling to the past.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

Quotes.q: Do anything, but let it produce joy.
Quotes.h:
“Do anything, but let it produce joy.” —
Walt Whitman

Quotes.q: You can do two things at once, but you can't focus effectively on two things at once.
Quotes.h:
“You can do two things at once, but you can't focus effectively on two things at once.” —
Gary Keller

Quotes.q: You have the freedom to be yourself, your true self, here and now, and nothing can stand in your way.
Quotes.h:
“You have the freedom to be yourself, your true self, here and now, and nothing can stand in your way.” —
Richard Bach

Quotes.q: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
Quotes.h:
“Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.” —
Dalai Lama

Quotes.q: Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than exposure.
Quotes.h:
“Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than exposure.” —
Helen Keller

Quotes.q: When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
Quotes.h:
“When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.” —
William James

Quotes.q: Wherever you are, it's the place you need to be.
Quotes.h:
“Wherever you are, it's the place you need to be.” —
Maxime Lagace

Quotes.q: Do what is right, not what is easy, nor what is popular.
Quotes.h:
“Do what is right, not what is easy, nor what is popular.” —
Roy T. Bennett

Quotes.q: The friendship that can cease has never been real.
Quotes.h:
“The friendship that can cease has never been real. ” —
St. Jerome

Quotes.q: The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.
Quotes.h:
“The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability. ” —
Henry Ford

Quotes.q: What the mind can conceive, it can achieve.
Quotes.h:
“What the mind can conceive, it can achieve.” —
Napoleon Hill

Quotes.q: Of all men's miseries the bitterest is this: to know so much and to have control over nothing.
Quotes.h:
“Of all men's miseries the bitterest is this: to know so much and to have control over nothing. ” —
Herodotus

Quotes.q: I no doubt deserved my enemies, but I don't believe I deserved my friends.
Quotes.h:
“I no doubt deserved my enemies, but I don't believe I deserved my friends.” —
Walt Whitman

Quotes.q: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
Quotes.h:
“Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.” —
W.P. Kinsella

Quotes.q: The purpose of life is to contribute in some way to making things better.
Quotes.h:
“The purpose of life is to contribute in some way to making things better.” —
Robert F. Kennedy

Quotes.q: To wish you were someone else is to waste the person you are.
Quotes.h:
“To wish you were someone else is to waste the person you are.” —
Unknown

Quotes.q: A man is literally what he thinks.
Quotes.h:
“A man is literally what he thinks.” —
James Allen

Quotes.q: Respect other people's feelings. It might mean nothing to you, but it could mean everything to them.
Quotes.h:
“Respect other people's feelings. It might mean nothing to you, but it could mean everything to them.” —
Roy T. Bennett

Quotes.q: Courage is found in unlikely places.
Quotes.h:
“Courage is found in unlikely places.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

Quotes.q: FEAR has two meanings: 'Forget Everything And Run' or 'Face Everything And Rise.' The choice is yours.
Quotes.h:
“FEAR has two meanings: 'Forget Everything And Run' or 'Face Everything And Rise.' The choice is yours.” —
Zig Ziglar

Quotes.q: What loneliness is more lonely than distrust?
Quotes.h:
“What loneliness is more lonely than distrust?” —
George Eliot

Quotes.q: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
Quotes.h:
“Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.” —
Brian Tracy

Quotes.q: I don't walk away from things that I think are unfinished.
Quotes.h:
“I don't walk away from things that I think are unfinished.” —
Arnold Schwarzenegger

Quotes.q: The fastest way to change is to laugh at your own folly.
Quotes.h:
“The fastest way to change is to laugh at your own folly.” —
Spencer Johnson

Quotes.q: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
Quotes.h:
“If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

Quotes.q: Perseverance and spirit have done wonders in all ages.
Quotes.h:
“Perseverance and spirit have done wonders in all ages. ” —
George Washington
